anaesthetic_dose.definition: The dose of the used anaesthetic.
anaesthetic_dose.value: 1 L/M of Isoflurane until unconcious, then 0.7 mL Pentobarbital

buffer.definition: The fluid used to flush out blood vessels.

description.definition: A textual description of the preparation.
description.value: Deeply anesthetized animal is perfused in order to preserve brain tissue for imunohistochemical analysis.

fixative.definition: The fluid used to fixate the tissue.
